topic: AI Research Publications and Responsible AI Frameworks

  proposition: Devon Myers and colleagues published a research paper on foundation and large language models in Cluster Computing.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Devon Myers|PUBLISHED|research paper
    Devon Myers|RESEARCH_FOCUS|foundation and large language models

    entity-entity relationships:
    Devon Myers|PUBLISHED_IN|Cluster Computing

  proposition: The paper explores fundamentals, challenges, opportunities, and social impacts of AI models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI models|EXPLORED_ASPECTS|fundamentals
    AI models|EXPLORED_ASPECTS|challenges
    AI models|EXPLORED_ASPECTS|opportunities
    AI models|EXPLORED_ASPECTS|social impacts

  proposition: OpenAI maintains a Red Teaming Network to assess AI system risks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    OpenAI|MAINTAINS|Red Teaming Network
    Red Teaming Network|PURPOSE|assess AI system risks

  proposition: Google Cloud provides a Responsible AI Guide for Vertex AI.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Google Cloud|PROVIDES|Responsible AI Guide
    Responsible AI Guide|ASSOCIATED_WITH|Vertex AI

  proposition: Google Research and Google AI have developed Responsible AI Practices.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Google Research|DEVELOPED|Responsible AI Practices
    Google AI|DEVELOPED|Responsible AI Practices

  proposition: Meta introduced Prompt Guard in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Meta|INTRODUCED|Prompt Guard
    Prompt Guard|INTRODUCTION_YEAR|2024

  proposition: The European Union has created an AI Act to regulate artificial intelligence.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    European Union|CREATED|AI Act
    AI Act|PURPOSE|regulate artificial intelligence

  proposition: The United States developed a Blueprint for an AI Bill of Rights in 2022.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    United States|DEVELOPED|Blueprint for an AI Bill of Rights
    Blueprint for an AI Bill of Rights|DEVELOPMENT_YEAR|2022

  proposition: China implemented Interim Measures for Generative AI Service Administration.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    China|IMPLEMENTED|Interim Measures for Generative AI Service Administration

  proposition: World Health Organization published guidance on ethics and governance of AI in healthcare.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    World Health Organization|PUBLISHED|guidance on ethics and governance of AI in healthcare

    entity-attribute relationships:
    OpenAI|RELEASED|system cards
    System cards|ASSOCIATED_WITH|GPT-4o
    System cards|ASSOCIATED_WITH|DALL-E 3

  proposition: OpenAI published a Charter outlining organizational principles in 2018.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    OpenAI|PUBLISHED|Charter
    Charter|CONTENT|organizational principles
    Charter|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2018

    entity-attribute relationships:
    Researchers|DEVELOPED|model cards

    entity-attribute relationships:

    entity-attribute relationships:
    OpenAI|CONDUCTING|Alignment Research

    entity-attribute relationships:
    OpenAI|WORKING_ON|secure infrastructure
    Secure infrastructure|ASSOCIATED_WITH|advanced AI

  proposition: OpenAI created an AI-written text classifier.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    OpenAI|CREATED|AI-written text classifier

  proposition: OpenAI launched a Democratic Inputs to AI Grant Program.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    OpenAI|LAUNCHED|Democratic Inputs to AI Grant Program

  proposition: Researchers have developed multiple open pre-trained transformer language models, including OPT, Llama, Llama 2, and Llama 3.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Researchers|DEVELOPED|open pre-trained transformer language models
    Open pre-trained transformer language models|INCLUDES|OPT
    Open pre-trained transformer language models|INCLUDES|Llama
    Open pre-trained transformer language models|INCLUDES|Llama 2
    Open pre-trained transformer language models|INCLUDES|Llama 3

  proposition: Meta is expanding open-source large language models responsibly.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Meta|EXPANDING|open-source large language models
    Open-source large language models|DEVELOPMENT_APPROACH|responsibly

  proposition: Researchers developed Llama Guard as an input-output safeguard for human-AI conversations.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Researchers|DEVELOPED|Llama Guard
    Llama Guard|PURPOSE|input-output safeguard for human-AI conversations
